description: Deletes a list of specified images that are within a repository in a public registry. Images are specified with either an imageTag or imageDigest. You can remove a tag from an image by specifying the image's tag in your request. When you remove the last tag from an image, the image is deleted from your repository. You can completely delete an image (and all of its tags) by specifying the digest of the image in your request.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The repository in a public registry that contains the image to delete.

parameters.name: imageIds
parameters.description: A list of image ID references that correspond to images to delete. The format of the imageIds reference is imageTag=tag or imageDigest=digest. (dict) --- An object with identifying information for an Amazon ECR image. imageDigest (string) --- The sha256 digest of the image manifest. imageTag (string) --- The tag that's used for the image.

nested_params.name: imageDigest
nested_params.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_params.name: imageTag
nested_params.description: The tag that's used for the image.

nested_items.name: imageIds
nested_items.description: The image IDs of the deleted images.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag that's used for the image.

nested_items.name: failures
nested_items.description: Any failures associated with the call.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag that's used for the image.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The code that's associated with the failure.
